scripts.build:arbitrum: yarn prepare:arbitrum && yarn codegen && graph build
scripts.build:optimism: yarn prepare:optimism && yarn codegen && graph build
scripts.build:polygon: yarn prepare:polygon && yarn codegen && graph build
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: yarn build:arbitrum && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ mean-finance/dca-v2-arbitrum-canary
scripts.deploy:arbitrum:stable: yarn build:arbitrum && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ mean-finance/dca-v2-arbitrum
scripts.deploy:optimism: yarn build:optimism && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ mean-finance/dca-v2-optimism-canary
scripts.deploy:optimism:stable: yarn build:optimism && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ mean-finance/dca-v2-optimism
scripts.deploy:polygon: yarn build:polygon && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ mean-finance/dca-v2-polygon-canary
scripts.deploy:polygon:stable: yarn build:polygon && graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ mean-finance/dca-v2-polygon
